Class_Quest_Name_Only You Can Prevent Fo: Only You Can Prevent Forest Ire
Class_Quest_Name_The Girl with the Drago: The Girl with the Dragon Tissue
Class_Skill_Desc_Aero: Deals wind damage with a potency of 50.</br>Additional Effect: Wind damage over time</br>Potency: 30</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Aero II: Deals wind damage with a potency of 50.</br>Additional Effect: Wind damage over time</br>Potency: 50</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Afflatus Misery: Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 1,240 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Can only be executed when the Blood Lily is in full bloom.
Class_Skill_Desc_Afflatus Rapture: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 400</br>Additional Effect: Nourishes the Blood Lily</br>Healing Gauge Cost: 1 Lily
Class_Skill_Desc_Afflatus Solace: Restores target's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 800</br>Additional Effect: Nourishes the Blood Lily//</br>Healing Gauge Cost: 1 Lily
Class_Skill_Desc_Aquaveil: Reduces damage taken by a party member or self by 15%.</br>Duration: 8s
Class_Skill_Desc_Assize: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 400 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Restores own HP and the HP of nearby party members</br>Cure Potency: 400</br>Additional Effect: Restores 5% of maximum MP
Class_Skill_Desc_Asylum: Envelops a designated area in a veil of succor, granting healing over time to self and any party members who enter.</br>Cure Potency: 100</br>Duration: 24s </br>Additional Effect: Increases HP recovery via healing actions on party members in the designated area by 10%//
Class_Skill_Desc_Benediction: Restores all of a target's HP.
Class_Skill_Desc_Breath of the Earth: Restores 60% of own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Class_Skill_Desc_Cure III: Restores own or target party member's HP and all party members nearby target.</br>Cure Potency: 600
Class_Skill_Desc_Dia: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 65.</br>Additional Effect: Unaspected damage over time</br>Potency: 65</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Divine Benison: Creates a barrier around self or target party member that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 500 potency.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Maximum Charges: 2//
Class_Skill_Desc_Esuna: Removes a single detrimental effect from target.
Class_Skill_Desc_Glare: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 290.
Class_Skill_Desc_Glare III: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 310.
Class_Skill_Desc_Healing Wind: Restores 25% of own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Class_Skill_Desc_Holy: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 140 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Stun</br>Duration: 4s
Class_Skill_Desc_Holy III: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 150 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Stun</br>Duration: 4s
Class_Skill_Desc_Liturgy of the Bell: Places a healing blossom at the designated location and grants 5 stacks of Liturgy of the Bell to self.</br>Duration: 20s</br>Taking damage will expend 1 stack of Liturgy of the Bell to heal self and all party members within a radius of 20 yalms.</br>Cure Potency: 400</br>The effect of this action can only be triggered once per second.</br>Any remaining stacks of Liturgy of the Bell will trigger an additional healing effect when time expires or upon executing this action a second time.</br>Cure Potency: 200 for every remaining stack of Liturgy of the Bell</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Medica: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 400
Class_Skill_Desc_Medica II: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 250</br>Additional Effect: Regen</br>Cure Potency: 150</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Afflatus Misery: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 12,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Afflatus Purgation: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 18,000 to all enemies in a straight line before you.</br>Additional Effect: Stun</br>Duration: 2s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Temperance</br>Temperance Effect: Increases damage dealt and healing potency by 10%, and grants Regen to self and nearby party members within 30 yalms</br>Cure Potency: 3,000</br>Duration: 15s</br>Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full.</br>Gauge Charge Time: 60s
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Aquaveil: Creates a barrier around self or target party member that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 8,000 potency.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Additional Effect: Nullifies one status affliction that can be removed by Purify</br>Barrier potency is doubled when successfully nullifying a status affliction.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Cure II: Restores target's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 12,000</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.</br>※Action changes to Cure III when under the effect of Cure III Ready.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Cure III: Restores HP of self or target and all party members nearby target.</br>Cure Potency: 16,000</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Cure III Ready.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Glare III: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 5,000.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Miracle of Nature: Forcibly transforms target into a diminutive creature, preventing them from using actions.</br>Duration: 2s</br>Has no effect on players under the effect of Guard, players riding machina, or non-player combatants.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Seraph Strike: Delivers a jumping attack that deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 8,000.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Protect to self and nearby party members</br>Protect Effect: Reduces damage taken by 10%</br>Duration: 10s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Cure III Ready</br>Duration: 10s</br>Cannot be executed while bound.</br>※Cure II changes to Cure III while under the effect of Cure III Ready.
Class_Skill_Desc_Plenary Indulgence: Grants Confession to self and nearby party members.</br>Upon receiving HP recovery via Medica, Medica II, Cure III, or Afflatus Rapture cast by self, Confession triggers an additional healing effect.</br>Cure Potency: 200</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Presence of Mind: Reduces spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 20%.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Pulse of Life: Restores 100% of own HP and the HP of all nearby party members, including ones KO'd.
Class_Skill_Desc_Raise: Resurrects target to a weakened state.
Class_Skill_Desc_Regen: Grants healing over time effect to target.</br>Cure Potency: 250</br>Duration: 18s
Class_Skill_Desc_Repose: Afflicts target with Sleep.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_Rescue: Instantly draws target party member to your side. Cannot be used outside of combat or when target is suffering from certain enfeeblements.
Class_Skill_Desc_Stone: Deals earth damage with a potency of 140.
Class_Skill_Desc_Stone II: Deals earth damage with a potency of 190.
Class_Skill_Desc_Stone III: Deals earth damage with a potency of 220.
Class_Skill_Desc_Stone IV: Deals earth damage with a potency of 260.
Class_Skill_Desc_Surecast: Spells can be cast without interruption.</br>Additional Effect: Nullifies most knockback and draw-in effects</br>Duration: 6s
Class_Skill_Desc_Temperance: Increases healing magic potency by 20%, while reducing damage taken by self and all party members within a radius of 50 yalms by 10%.</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Skill_Desc_Thin Air: Next action is executed without MP cost.</br>Duration: 12s</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Status_Desc_Aquaveil: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Divine Benison: A holy blessing from the gods is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Liturgy of the Bell: Triggers a healing effect upon taking damage, when duration expires, or upon executing Liturgy of the Bell a second time.
Class_Status_Desc_Miracle of Nature: Transfiguration magicks have changed your form. Unable to execute actions.
Class_Status_Desc_Surecast: Spells cannot be interrupted by taking damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Swiftcast: Next spell will require no time to cast.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Asylum: Adds an additional effect to Asylum that increases HP recovery via healing actions by 10%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Divine Benison: Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Divine Benison.</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Healing Magic: Increases the healing potency of Cure to 500, Medica to 400, Cure II to 800, Regen to 250, Cure III to 600, Medica II to 250, Medica II's Regen effect to 150, Afflatus Solace to 800, and Afflatus Rapture to 400.
Class_Trait_Desc_Freecure: Grants a 15% chance that after casting Cure, the MP cost for your next Cure II will be 0.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Trait_Desc_Maim and Mend: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 10%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Maim and Mend II: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 30%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Secret of the Lily: Adds a Lily to your Healing Gauge for every 20 seconds you are engaged in combat, up to a maximum of 3.
Class_Trait_Desc_Stone Mastery II: Upgrades Stone II to Stone III.
Class_Trait_Desc_Stone Mastery III: Upgrades Stone III to Stone IV.
Class_Trait_Desc_Transcendent Afflatus: Adds a Blood Lily to the Healing Gauge that blooms after three uses of Afflatus Solace or Afflatus Rapture.
